news_items.content: Chennai News Today: Find Chennai latest news and headlines on weather updates, entertainment politics, schools, crime, festivals, and real estate.
Tamil Nadu tops the country in Gross Enrolment Ratio. AICTE Chairman T.N. Stalin supports Indian Army, leading a solidarity rally in support of troops.
Three college students drowned in Coimbatore River. One kilogram of cocaine worth Rs 6 crore was seized in Chennai, with eight arrested.
A strong dust storm hits Delhi and adjoining areas. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) issues a red alert for the region.
Pawan Kalyan completes filming for his upcoming movie Hari Hara Veera. His next film is wrapped up.
CM Stalin's anti-terrorism war cry is echoed at Marina march, where he addresses the crowd. MTC announces plans to add 100 small buses to improve Chennai's public transportation system.
India shuts down Pakistan's false claims in a press conference after the ceasefire agreement. A baby named Sindoor becomes a national sensation in Rajasthan.
A new mission called ShaktiSat aims to host 300 students from across the world, including India, at its facility on the Moon. Panagal Park in Chennai turns grey due to Metro project construction.
The Giants of Silicon Valley are facing an "innovator's dilemma" as they struggle with AI development. SoftBank CEO has a different outlook, stating that ASI will be developed within 10 years.
Apple is working on custom chips for smart glasses and more. The company announces its plans to use AI in drug evaluation.
Elton John and Dua Lipa seek protection from AI entities. Arizona man shot and killed by his ex-boyfriend returns to address the killer.
Google plans to roll out its AI technology, citing the need for safer artificial intelligence. OpenAI unveils a new technology that can "reason" with images.

The US Department of Labor closes an investigation into Scale AI's compliance with the Fair Labor Standards Act. India-Pakistan ceasefire agreement has been confirmed but Pakistan violates the agreement along their border.
A hybrid AI model is developed to craft high-quality videos in seconds. Q&A sessions are held on the development and applications of AI technology.
The Sensex tanked 800 points, while the Nifty 50 nears 24,000 due to recent market fluctuations and concerns over India-Pakistan tensions.
Nifty 50 and Sensex today: What to expect from Indian stock market in trade on May 9 amid India-Pakistan war.
